title: spec: define comparison of struct with _ fields
body:
I assume that we intend comparison of structs with _ fields
to be legal and for the comparison to be defined as comparing
the non-_ fields (since the _ fields cannot be set or read).

However, I do not believe this is spelled out in the spec,
and I got it wrong in the compiler (it is trying to compare
the _ fields and won't let itself read them).
